Text:
needs some trick to run, you have to launch fgfs with --fgfs-root=/usr/share/games/FlightGear/

The packages are done very fast, if you have some trouble contact me.  My email is in fgfs-base package's mantainer's email.  I also have i386 packages aviable
¡¡¡¡ATENTION!!!  Theese are LINUX packages, Windows users:  this is not going to work with you!!!!
